comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Users

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Users.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds an instance of an user (the user of the app), allows for logging in users with elastic search or memory.
    See Also:
    Request, RequestList

    • Method Detail

      • setLoggedInUser

        public void setLoggedInUser(User user)
        Will return the singleton instance of the current logged in user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessError - if there is no currently logged in user.
        See Also:
        logInUser(String)

      • offlineLogInUser

        public static boolean offlineLogInUser(java.lang.String usernameToLogin,
                                       User cachedUser)
        Allows the user to log in while offline. Only the last logged in user has the ability to log in.
        Parameters:
        usernameToLogin - The username attempt to log in
        cachedUser - The cached user to compare to
        Returns:
        True on successful login, otherwise false

      • setEmail

                     java.lang.String email)

        public static User getLoggedInUser()

      • checkValidInputs

        public static java.lang.String checkValidInputs(@NonNull
                                                java.lang.String username,
                                                @NonNull
                                                java.lang.String email,
                                                @NonNull
                                                java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Attempt to create a new user, if successful it will set the new user to the logged in user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username that the new user will have
        email - The email the new user will have
        phoneNumber - The phone number the new user will have.
        Returns:
        A string containing an error message if unsuccessful, otherwise null.

      • createNewUser

        public static void createNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                 java.lang.String vehicleDescription)
        Attempt to create a new user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username the user should be made with
        email - The email the user wants to have
        phoneNumber - The phone number of the new user
        vehicleDescription - The description of the user's vehicle

      • validateEmail

        private static boolean validateEmail(java.lang.String email)
        returns true if the email matches a valid email pattern.

      • validatePhone

        private static boolean validatePhone(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        returns true if the phone number matches a valid phone number pattern

      • checkUniqueUsername

        private static boolean checkUniqueUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Attempts to check elastic search for the passed username. Returns whether or not that username was found.
        Parameters:
        username - The username you would like to check elastic search for.
        Returns:
        True if that username was found, false otherwise.

      • editUser

        public static void editUser(java.lang.String newEmail,
                            java.lang.String newPhone)
        Edits the logged in user given a newEmail and newPhone
        Parameters:
        newEmail - The email to change to
        newPhone - The phone number to change to

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser(java.lang.String usernameToDelete)
        Deletes a user from elastic search. (For testing only)
        Parameters:
        usernameToDelete - The username to delete from ElasticSearch

      • logOutUser

        public static void logOutUser()
        Logs out the current user by setting them to null.

      • logInUser

        public static boolean logInUser(java.lang.String username)
        Attempts to log in a user and set that user to the singleton instance.
        Parameters:
        username - The username you would like to try logging in with.
        Returns:
        True if the user was successfully logged in, else false.

      • findUser

        public static User findUser(java.lang.String username)
        Searches elastic search for the given username and returns a User object matching that username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to search for
        Returns:
        The specified User (by username)
